name: FlipPix Art - Museum
description:
New! FlipPix Art - Museum is now designed for both the iPhone and the iPad!

Take a tour and check out the exhibits. FlipPix Art - Museum consists of 7 scenes containing 300 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 20x20. Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art puzzles are designed for both the iPhone and iPad.

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
